page.title: 17VIEWS ON THE POWER STATION
page.content: I think most of the people we asked did not want a{nuclear power station} in this area,but some did not mind if it was placed somewhere else. they all agreed that it would provide more jobs but this would decrease the number of people working at the local pit. Most people said it would affect people's health,especially the old.For question number four the people said it would spoil the enviroment. Number five proved the most difficult. Most of the people (e.g the old) would have to stay where they are now as they have established their homes to suit themselves for the rest of their lives. Overall most people would want to move if a{nuclear power station was built in this area.
